title: Reese's Puffs Minis Breakfast Cereal, Chocolate Peanut Butter Cereal, Family Size, 19.8 OZ
features: The same chocolatey peanut butter taste of Reese's Puffs now in itty bitty mini puffs
The perfect pair of Hershey's chocolate and Reese's peanut butter for an epic cereal or snack
Made with real REESE'S peanut butter for a breakfast cereal like no other
Mini breakfast cereal with no high fructose corn syrup
Pour REESE'S PUFFS Minis in your bowl for part of an epic breakfast or munch the mini puffs by the handful as a sweet and crunchy snack
description: Grab a spoonful of the unbeatable chocolatey peanut butter taste of REESE'S PUFFS Minis Chocolatey Peanut Butter Breakfast Cereal. The iconic REESE's peanut butter & HERSHEY'S chocolate flavor you know and love now comes in these adorably mini puffs for more crunch on your spoon. Pour yourself a bowl, add them as an ice cream topper, make cereal bars or serve them as a kids party snack, REESE'S PUFFS Minis cereal will be your new favorite go-to cereal or snack. REESE'S PUFFS Minis cereal is made with 15g of whole grain per serving (at least 48 grams recommended daily) and has no high fructose corn syrup. The cereal box and liner bag are easy to store and grab and go as part of a quick breakfast, after school snack or bedtime snack. REESE'S PUFFS is part of General Mills Big G cereals that exist to spread goodness from tots to grown-ups.
